Body: Possible Duplicate:  “Converting to multimedia message” when forwarding large SMS  I have a Galaxy S I9000. I can't send long messages. When it reaches the 3 SMS limit it changes into MMS. I don't want it to be sent as an MMS. Is there a way to redefine this limit so that I can send send, for example, 4 text messages as one?
